name: Princeton Ventures
tag_list: growth-equity, late-stage, later-stage, technology, software, internet, financial-services, healthcare, ecommerce, information, venture-capital, private-equity
overview:
Princeton Ventures leads equity investments ranging in size from $5 million to $50+ million in middle- to later-stage growth businesses.

The entrepreneurs with whom we work are generally doing well on their own but choose to partner with Princeton to fuel growth, make acquisitions, or help shareholders “take some chips off the table” prior to an ultimate exit. We target businesses with between $10 million and $50 million of revenue and are content being minority or control partners in the companies we invest.

We have experience investing in over 25 businesses in a variety of verticals including Business Services, Consumer Products and Services, eCommerce, Financial Services, Healthcare Services, Information Services, Internet and New Media, and Technology-enabled Products and Services.
